Question
========

If you roll a pure die three times in a row, what is the is the probability of getting a six at least once?

Answerlist
----------

* 16/52
* 25/216
* 31/216
* 91/216

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 16/52: Incorrect
* 25/216: Incorrect
* 31/216: Incorrect
* 91/216: Correct
